feed.title: Authman Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Authman: 1.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(user): Add refresh sessions API by @asika32764 in https://github.com/simular/authman-server/pull/1
  • feat(auth): Clear login token by @asika32764 in https://github.com/simular/authman-server/pull/2
  • feat(account): Add accounts limit by @asika32764 in https://github.com/simular/authman-server/pull/3

New Contributors

  • @asika32764 made their first contribution in https://github.com/simular/authman-server/pull/1

Full Changelog: https://github.com/simular/authman-server/compare/1.0.0...1.0.1
